All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AffineTransform2D
This class represents an affine transformation implementing the Transform2D interface.
App
The main class of the application.
ChaosCanvas
This class represents a canvas for the Chaos Game.
ChaosGame
This class represents the Chaos Game.
ChaosGameController
This class is the controller for the Chaos Game application.
ChaosGameDescription
This class represents the description of a Chaos Game.
ChaosGameDescriptionFactory
This class is responsible for creating different types of ChaosGameDescription objects.
ChaosGameFileHandler
This class is responsible for handling file operations related to the ChaosGame.
ChaosGameView
This class represents the view for the Chaos Game.
Cli
This class represents a Command Line Interface (CLI) for displaying menus and messages to the user.
CLICommandGroup
This class represents a group of commands that can be executed from the command line interface (CLI).
CLIController
This class represents the controller for the command line interface (CLI).
Color
A utility class making it easier to color text and background in terminal.
Command
A functional interface representing the baseline of a command.
Complex
Represents a complex number with a real and an imaginary part.
ErrorDialog
This class is used to display error messages to the user in a dialog box.
Event
The Event enum represents various events that can occur in the application.
ExitCommand
This class represents the exit command in the CLI.
FileHandlingException
This class represents a custom exception that is thrown when there is an error in file handling.
FractalDialog
This class represents a dialog box for editing or creating fractals.
InvalidFormatException
This class represents an exception thrown when the input has an invalid format.
InvalidInputException
This class represents an exception thrown when the input is logically invalid.
JuliaTransform
This class represents a Julia Transformation implementing the Transform2D interface.
LoadFileDialog
This class represents a dialog box for loading a file.
Matrix2x2
Represents a 2x2 matrix.
NumberField
This class represents a TextField specifically designed to handle numeric input.
NumberField.Builder
This class represents a Builder for the NumberField class.
Observable
Interface representing an observable object, or "data" in the model-view-controller design pattern.
Observer
Interface representing an observer object, or "view" in the model-view-controller design pattern.
PrintFractalCommand
This class represents the print fractal command in the CLI.
ReadFileCommand
This class represents the read file command in the CLI.
RunStepsCommand
This class represents the run steps command in the CLI.
SaveFileDialog
This class represents a dialog box for saving a file.
StyledButton
This class represents a Button with customizable styles.
StyledButton.Builder
This class represents a Builder for the StyledButton class.
ThrowingSupplier<T>
The ThrowingSupplier interface is a functional interface that represents a supplier of results.
Transform2D
This interface represents a 2D transformation.
ValidatedInput
The ValidatedInput class is responsible for handling user input validation.
Vector2D
Represents a 2D vector with two coordinates: x0 and x1.
WriteToFileCommand
This class represents the write to file command in the CLI.
